attributes.action: Create a car tax for people to keep there car parked without using it on the road
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After declaring my car off road i kept it on private property, when i needed to put it back on the road i took it for mot which failed i had it outside my house waiting for parts only to get it clamped £260 before having the chance to get it mot and taxed. i know i will get £160 back now its taxed but this was only 1 week i believe there should be some sort of certificate or disk you can buy to keep your car on the roadside without driving and without mot OR road tax as not everyone has a drive way to keep it safe while work is being done.
